requirements.summary: Rename the application to 'Study Calculator' in all visible branding locations
acceptanceCriteria: The header in the app displays 'Study Calculator' as the app name.
The browser tab title (index.html <title>) reads 'Study Calculator'.
No other instances of a different app name remain visible in the UI.

file_operations.description: Update the <title> element to display 'Study Calculator' so the browser tab reflects the new app name.
Update the branded header title text to display 'Study Calculator' instead of the current app name, ensuring the header shows the new branding without changing layout or functionality.
